name: Valkyrie Ragnarok
description:
The Dragon Orb treasure has been stolen from Asgard.

It is a treasure that contains infinity energy, once it falls into the wrong hands, it is extremely dangerous. Who could have stolen it? For what purpose? Play as Valkyrie Luz, experience her journey into Midgard - the human world with a mission to track down the Dragon Orb.

Special thanks to these plugin developer
Yanfly / Mog Hunter / Hakuen Studio / Quixous/ Tsukimi/ Hime
